{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Comtrend |model=WR-5887 |fcc_date=05/04/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=L9VWR5887, NDD9564781213 |pwr_v=4 |pwr_amp=2 |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197D;RMC, RTL8197D, C5K17P8, GC52, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=660 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206EM2I-12G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |serial=yes,, internal,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, J1,, (38400,8,N,1) |wi1_module=Edimax EW-7822MAC |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8812AR |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5 GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85601;SKY, 85601, 229CU;2;;16-pin QFN;2.5x2.5mm; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|AC 1200 Wireless Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://us.comtrend.com/products/wr-5887/}}
This is a FCC change in ID request from the [[Edimax BR-6478AC]] (NDD9564781213).
